org.ldaptive.provider.ConnectionFactoryMetadata

org.ldaptive.provider   
 

Uses of ConnectionFactoryMetadata in org.ldaptive.provider
 

Methods in org.ldaptive.provider that return ConnectionFactoryMetadata
protected  ConnectionFactoryMetadata AbstractProviderConnectionFactory.getMetadata()
          Returns the connection factory metadata.
 

Methods in org.ldaptive.provider with parameters of type ConnectionFactoryMetadata
 String[] ConnectionStrategies.DefaultConnectionStrategy.getLdapUrls(ConnectionFactoryMetadata metadata)
          Returns an array containing a single entry URL that is the supplied url.
 String[] ConnectionStrategies.ActivePassiveConnectionStrategy.getLdapUrls(ConnectionFactoryMetadata metadata)
          Return the URLs in the order they are provided, so that the first URL is always tried first, then the second, and so forth.
 String[] ConnectionStrategies.RoundRobinConnectionStrategy.getLdapUrls(ConnectionFactoryMetadata metadata)
          Return a list of URLs that cycles the list order.
 String[] ConnectionStrategies.RandomConnectionStrategy.getLdapUrls(ConnectionFactoryMetadata metadata)
          Return a list of URLs in random order.
 String[] ConnectionStrategy.getLdapUrls(ConnectionFactoryMetadata metadata)
          Returns an ordered list of URLs to attempt to open.
